AU.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
AU.description: Bonus until 16/11/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pikachu & Poké Ball for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/12/2017. Bonus until 10/01/2018: Download code for 12 Quick Balls for Pokémon™ Ultra Moon for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon offer an alternative story taking place in the same world as Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon, as well as new Pokémon that didn’t appear in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon. There will be additional elements to let you enjoy your adventure even more. Ominous dark clouds are spreading in the sky above the Alola region, the setting of Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon. In these adventures, a story unfolds on a grand scale, with the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo, Lunala, and Necrozma at its centre. Secrets about Necrozma and the Alola region – undisclosed in the previous games – will come to light.

BG.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
BG.description: Bonus until 16/11/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pikachu & Poké Ball for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/12/2017. Bonus until 10/01/2018: Download code for 12 Quick Balls for Pokémon™ Ultra Moon for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon offer an alternative story taking place in the same world as Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon, as well as new Pokémon that didn’t appear in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon. There will be additional elements to let you enjoy your adventure even more. Ominous dark clouds are spreading in the sky above the Alola region, the setting of Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon. In these adventures, a story unfolds on a grand scale, with the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo, Lunala, and Necrozma at its centre. Secrets about Necrozma and the Alola region – undisclosed in the previous games – will come to light.

BE.name: Pokémon™ Ultra-Lune
BE.description: Bonus valable jusqu'au 16/11/2017 : Code de téléchargement pour le thème Pokémon : Pikachu et Poké Ball sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 31/12/2017. Bonus valable jusqu'au 10/01/2018 : Code de téléchargement pour 12 Rapide Balls pour Pokémon™ Ultra-Lune sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra-Soleil et Pokémon Ultra-Lune proposent une histoire alternative se déroulant dans le même monde que Pokémon Soleil et Pokémon Lune, ainsi que de nouveaux Pokémon qui ne figuraient pas dans Pokémon Soleil et Pokémon Lune. Il y aura également d'autres éléments additionnels qui vous permettront de profiter de l'aventure encore davantage.

AT.name: Pokémon™ Ultramond
AT.description: Bonus bis zum 16.11.2017: Downloadcode für das Pokémon: Pikachu mit Pokéball Design für den Nintendo 3DS. Der Downloadcode ist bis zum 31.12.2017 gültig. Bonus bis zum 10.01.2018: Downloadcode für zwölf Flottbälle für Pokémon™ Ultramond für den Nintendo 3DS. Der Downloadcode ist bis zum 30.11.2018 gültig. Pokémon Ultrasonne und Pokémon Ultramond bieten eine alternative Geschichte, die in der gleichen Welt spielt wie Pokémon Sonne und Pokémon Mond. Außerdem sind neue Pokémon mit dabei, die weder in Pokémon Sonne noch in Pokémon Mond vorkamen und es gibt neue Elemente, die das Abenteuer noch unterhaltsamer machen.

BR.name: Pokémon Ultra Moon
BR.description: Disponível para pré-compra e download antecipado. Com a função de download antecipado, você estará pronto para jogar após uma pequena atualização quando o jogo for lançado, à 0h dia 17/11 (horário da costa leste). Ao selecionar “Comprar”, você concorda que pagará adiantado o preço total de compra do título (mais os impostos devidos) e que você não poderá jogar o jogo até o dia do seu lançamento. O pagamento não poderá ser reembolsado, exceto se exigido por lei. É necessário ter uma conexão de internet para receber uma pequena atualização. Receba uma dúzia de Quick Balls por meio de um código de download com a compra da versão digital de Pokémon Ultra Sun ou de Pokémon Ultra Moon. A distribuição dos códigos começará na sexta-feira, 2 de novembro de 2017, e terminará na quarta-feira, 10 de janeiro de 2018. Certifique-se de inserir o código especial no seu jogo até dia 30 de novembro de 2018. Uma nova luz brilha na região de Alola! Assuma o papel de um Treinador de Pokémon para desvendar o mistério por trás das duas novas formas do Pokémon Lendário Necrozma: Dusk Mane Necrozma no jogo Pokémon™ Ultra Sun e Dawn Wings Necrozma no jogo Pokémon Ultra Moon. Um novíssimo duelo o aguarda! Novas formas Pokémon foram descobertas na região de Alola! O Pokémon Lendário Necrozma se transformou em duas novas formas: Dusk Mane Necrozma, que dominou Solgaleo em Pokémon Ultra Sun, e Dawn Wings Necrozma que dominou Lunala em Pokémon Ultra Moon. Entre de cabeça em uma jornada épica como um Treinador de Pokémon e resolva o mistério por trás deste Pokémon fascinante, explore ainda mais a região de Alola, capture Pokémon incríveis, e lute contra adversários formidáveis em Pokémon Ultra Sun e Pokémon Ultra Moon!

CA.name: Pokémon Ultra Moon
CA.description: Available for pre-purchase and pre-load. With the pre-load feature, you will be ready to play after a small update when the game launches on 11/17 midnight (EST). By clicking ‘Purchase,’ you agree that you will be charged in advance for the full purchase price of the title (plus applicable taxes), and that you cannot play the title before the launch date. This purchase price is non-refundable except to the extent required by law. An internet connection is required to receive the small update. Get a dozen Quick Balls via download code with the purchase of the digital version of either Pokémon Ultra Sun or Pokémon Ultra Moon. The code distribution will be available from Friday, November 2, 2017, until Wednesday, January 10, 2018. Be sure to enter the special code into your game by November 30, 2018. A new light shines on the Alola region! Take on the role of a Pokémon™ Trainer and unravel the mystery of the Legendary Pokémon Necrozma’s new forms: Dusk Mane Necrozma in the Pokémon Ultra Sun game and Dawn Wings Necrozma in the Pokémon Ultra Moon game. You can encounter and battle 400+ Pokémon, including new forms. A brand-new showdown awaits! Discover the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo and Lunala’s new Z-Moves and their mysterious connection to the Legendary Pokémon Necrozma. Then venture into Ultra Wormholes to explore the Ultra Beasts’ home world, encounter every Legendary Pokémon, and uncover Ultra Megalopolis, a dark world where Necrozma has stolen the light. On the bright side, the Alola region has new activities, and fresh landscapes to explore with some assistance from your powered-up Rotom Dex. You’ll need all the help you can get if you’re going to stop Giovanni, Ghetsis, and the rest of Team Rainbow Rocket from taking over the Alola region!

Bonus until 10/01/2018: Download code for 12 Quick Balls for Pokémon™ Ultra Moon for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon offer an alternative story taking place in the same world as Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon, as well as new Pokémon that didn’t appear in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon. There will be additional elements to let you enjoy your adventure even more. Ominous dark clouds are spreading in the sky above the Alola region, the setting of Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon. Bonus bis zum 10.01.2018: Downloadcode für zwölf Flottbälle für Pokémon™ Ultramond für den Nintendo 3DS. Der Downloadcode ist bis zum 30.11.2018 gültig. ES.name: Pokémon™ Ultraluna
ES.description: Bonificación hasta el 16-11-2017: Código de descarga para el tema Pokémon: Pikachu con Poké Ball para Nintendo 3DS. El código de descarga es válido hasta el 31-12-2017. Bonificación hasta el 10-01-2018: Código de descarga para 12 Veloz Ball para Pokémon™ Ultraluna para Nintendo 3DS. El código de descarga es válido hasta el 30-11-2018. Pokémon Ultrasol y Pokémon Ultraluna ofrecen una historia alternativa que se desarrolla en el mismo mundo que Pokémon Sol y Pokémon Luna, además de nuevos Pokémon que no estaban en Pokémon Sol ni en Pokémon Luna. Habrá elementos adicionales que te permitirán disfrutar de tu aventura aún más.

FI.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
FI.description: Bonus until 16/11/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pikachu & Poké Ball for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/12/2017. Secrets about Necrozma and the Alola region – undisclosed in the previous games – will come to light.

KR.name: 포켓몬스터 울트라문
KR.description: 신비한 생명체인 포켓몬을「모으고」「키우고」「배틀하고」「교환」하면서 모험하는 『포켓몬스터』시리즈의 최신작! 이야기는 온난한 기후의 섬들로 이루어진 알로라지방이 무대입니다. 전설의 포켓몬 「솔가레오」와「루나아라」그리고 수수께끼에 싸인「네크로즈마」에 얽힌 알로라지방의 비밀이 밝혀져,『포켓몬스터썬・문』과는 다른 이야기가 기다리고 있습니다. 게다가 닌텐도 3DS의 「포켓몬스터」 시리즈 집대성이라는 표현에 걸맞는 '울트라'한 체험도 한가득! 가까이에 있는 친구나 전 세계의 포켓몬 트레이너들과 포켓몬을 교환・배틀을 즐기는 통신기능은 물론, 마음에 드는 포켓몬과 함께 여러 사진을 찍을 수 있는「알로라포토클럽」, 「만타인」을 타고 서핑을 즐기는 레저「만타인 서핑」등 『포켓몬스터 울트라썬・울트라문』의 매력을 체험할 수 있습니다. 등장하는 포켓몬은 400종류 이상으로 『포켓몬스터썬・문』에서는 만날 수 없었던 포켓몬도 등장합니다. 새로운 이야기, 새로운 즐거움이 있는 『포켓몬스터 울트라썬・울트라문』의 세계를 모험해 보세요!

FR.name: Pokémon™ Ultra-Lune
FR.description: Bonus valable jusqu'au 16/11/2017 : Code de téléchargement pour le thème Pokémon : Pikachu et Poké Ball sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 31/12/2017. IT.name: Pokémon™ Ultraluna
IT.description: Bonus valido fino al giorno 16/11/2017: Codice download per il tema Pokémon: Pikachu e Poké Ball per Nintendo 3DS. Il codice download è valido fino al giorno 31/12/2017. Bonus valido fino al giorno 10/01/2018: Codice download per 12 Velox Ball del gioco Pokémon™ Ultraluna per Nintendo 3DS. Il codice download è valido fino al giorno 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultrasole e Pokémon Ultraluna offrono una storia alternativa che si svolge nel mondo di Pokémon Sole e Pokémon Luna, oltre a nuovi Pokémon che non erano presenti in Pokémon Sole e Pokémon Luna. Ci saranno elementi aggiuntivi che ti permetteranno di goderti ancora di più la tua avventura.

NL.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
NL.description: Bonus geldig tot en met 16-11-2017: Downloadcode voor het thema Pokémon: Pikachu met Pokébal voor de Nintendo 3DS. De downloadcode is geldig tot en met 31-12-2017. Bonus geldig tot en met 10-01-2018: Downloadcode voor 12 Quick Balls voor Pokémon™ Ultra Moon voor de Nintendo 3DS. De downloadcode is geldig tot en met 30-11-2018. In Pokémon Ultra Sun en Pokémon Ultra Moon kunnen spelers een alternatieve verhaallijn volgen in de wereld van Pokémon Sun en Pokémon Moon. In deze nieuwe games kom je ook nieuwe Pokémon tegen die niet voorkomen in Pokémon Sun en Pokémon Moon. Pokémon Ultra Sun en Pokémon Ultra Moon bevatten daarnaast extra content die het avontuur nog specialer maakt.

MX.name: Pokémon Ultra Moon
MX.description: Disponible para precompra y predescarga. Con la función de predescarga solo necesitarás realizar una pequeña descarga para jugar y estará disponible a partir del lanzamiento del juego el 17/11 a las 00:00 (horario del Este). Al seleccionar la opción "Adquirir" aceptas un cargo por adelantado del costo total del título (incluyendo los impuestos pertinentes) y que no podrás jugar el título antes de la fecha de lanzamiento. Este costo no es reembolsable a menos de que así lo disponga la ley. Necesitas una conexión a internet para recibir la pequeña actualización. Obtén una docena de Veloz Balls a través de un código de descarga con la compra de las versiones digitales de Pokémon Ultra Sun o Pokémon Ultra Moon. La distribución de códigos estará disponible a partir del viernes 2 de noviembre de 2017 hasta el 10 de enero de 2018. Asegúrate de introducir el código especial en el juego antes del 30 de noviembre de 2018. ¡Una nueva luz brilla en la región de Alola! Conviértete en un entrenador Pokémon y resuelve el misterio detrás de las dos nuevas formas del Pokémon legendario Necrozma: Necrozma Melena Crepuscular del juego Pokémon™ Ultra Sun y Necrozma Alas del Alba del juego Pokémon™ Ultra Moon. ¡Un nuevo enfrentamiento te espera! ¡Se han descubierto nuevas formas de Pokémon en la región de Alola! El Pokémon legendario Necrozma se ha transformado en dos nuevas formas: Necrozma Melena Crepuscular, quién tomó el control de Solgaleo en Pokémon Ultra Sun y Necrozma Alas del Alba que tomó el control de Lunala en Pokémon Ultra Moon. Embárcate en una épica aventura como un entrenador Pokémon y resuelve los enigmas detrás de estos fascinantes Pokémon, explora la región de Alola, atrapa increíbles Pokémon y ¡combate contra temibles enemigos en Pokémon Ultra Sun y Pokémon Ultra Moon!

PT.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
PT.description: Bónus até 16/11/2017: Código de download para o tema Pokémon: Pikachu e Pokébola para a Nintendo 3DS. O código de download é válido até 31/12/2017. Bónus até 10/01/2018: Código de download para 12 Quick Balls para Pokémon™ Ultra Moon para a Nintendo 3DS. O código de download é válido até 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra Sun e Pokémon Ultra Moon oferecem uma história alternativa que decorre no mesmo mundo que Pokémon Sun e Pokémon Moon, assim como novos Pokémon não presentes nestes dois jogos. Haverá elementos adicionais que te permitirão usufruir ainda mais da tua aventura.

CZ.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
CZ.description: Bonus until 16/11/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pikachu & Poké Ball for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/12/2017. Bonus until 10/01/2018: Download code for 12 Quick Balls for Pokémon™ Ultra Moon for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon offer an alternative story taking place in the same world as Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon, as well as new Pokémon that didn’t appear in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon. There will be additional elements to let you enjoy your adventure even more. Ominous dark clouds are spreading in the sky above the Alola region, the setting of Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon. In these adventures, a story unfolds on a grand scale, with the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo, Lunala, and Necrozma at its centre. Secrets about Necrozma and the Alola region – undisclosed in the previous games – will come to light.

US.name: Pokémon Ultra Moon
US.description: Available for pre-purchase and pre-load. With the pre-load feature, you will be ready to play after a small update when the game launches on 11/17 midnight (EST). By clicking ‘Purchase,’ you agree that you will be charged in advance for the full purchase price of the title (plus applicable taxes), and that you cannot play the title before the launch date. This purchase price is non-refundable except to the extent required by law. An internet connection is required to receive the small update. Get a dozen Quick Balls via download code with the purchase of the digital version of either Pokémon Ultra Sun or Pokémon Ultra Moon. The code distribution will be available from Friday, November 2, 2017, until Wednesday, January 10, 2018. Be sure to enter the special code into your game by November 30, 2018. A new light shines on the Alola region! Take on the role of a Pokémon™ Trainer and unravel the mystery of the Legendary Pokémon Necrozma’s new forms: Dusk Mane Necrozma in the Pokémon Ultra Sun game and Dawn Wings Necrozma in the Pokémon Ultra Moon game. You can encounter and battle 400+ Pokémon, including new forms. A brand-new showdown awaits! Discover the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo and Lunala’s new Z-Moves and their mysterious connection to the Legendary Pokémon Necrozma. Then venture into Ultra Wormholes to explore the Ultra Beasts’ home world, encounter every Legendary Pokémon, and uncover Ultra Megalopolis, a dark world where Necrozma has stolen the light. On the bright side, the Alola region has new activities, and fresh landscapes to explore with some assistance from your powered-up Rotom Dex. You’ll need all the help you can get if you’re going to stop Giovanni, Ghetsis, and the rest of Team Rainbow Rocket from taking over the Alola region!

RU.name: Pokémon™ Ultra Moon
RU.description: Бонус действителен до 16.11.2017: Код загрузки для темы Pokémon: Пикачу и покешар для системы Nintendo 3DS. Код загрузки действителен до 31.12.2017. Бонус действителен до 10.01.2018: Код загрузки для 12 шаров Quick Ball для Pokémon™ Ultra Moon для системы Nintendo 3DS. Код загрузки действителен до 30.11.2018. Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Pokémon Ultra Sun и Pokémon Ultra Moon предлагают альтернативную историю, которая развернется в мире игр Pokémon Sun и Pokémon Moon, а также новых покемонов, которых не было в Pokémon Sun и Pokémon Moon. Также в новых играх появятся дополнительные элементы, которые сделают ваше приключение еще более увлекательным.

JP.name: ポケットモンスター ウルトラムーン
JP.description: 不思議な生き物ポケモンを「集めたり」「育てたり」「バトルしたり」「交換したり」しながら冒険する『ポケットモンスター』シリーズ最新作! 物語の舞台は温暖な気候の島々からなる「アローラ地方」。本作では、伝説のポケモン「ソルガレオ」と「ルナアーラ」、そして謎に包まれた「ネクロズマ」にまつわるアローラ地方の秘密が明かされ、『サン・ムーン』とはちがう物語が待ち受けています。 さらに本作は、ニンテンドー3DSにおける『ポケットモンスター』シリーズの集大成にふさわしい“ウルトラ”な体験が盛りだくさん! 近くの友達や世界中のポケモントレーナーたちとポケモン交換・バトルを楽しめる通信機能はもちろん、お気に入りのポケモンといっしょに、いろいろな写真が撮れる「アローラフォトクラブ」、「マンタイン」の背中に乗せてもらいサーフィンを楽しむレジャー「マンタインサーフ」などの新機能も充実。登場するポケモンは400種類以上で、『サン・ムーン』では出会えなかったポケモンも登場します。 さらに、過去のシリーズで活躍したすべての伝説のポケモンが大集結し、仲間にすることもできます。また、歴代の悪の組織のボスが集結した「レインボーロケット団」がアローラ地方に襲来し、かつてない巨大な危機に立ち向かうことになります。 新しい物語、新しい遊びの待つ『ポケットモンスター ウルトラサン・ウルトラムーン』の世界を冒険しましょう!

LU.name: Pokémon™ Ultra-Lune
LU.description: Bonus valable jusqu'au 16/11/2017 : Code de téléchargement pour le thème Pokémon : Pikachu et Poké Ball sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 31/12/2017. Bonus valable jusqu'au 10/01/2018 : Code de téléchargement pour 12 Rapide Balls pour Pokémon™ Ultra-Lune sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 30/11/2018. Pokémon Ultra-Soleil et Pokémon Ultra-Lune proposent une histoire alternative se déroulant dans le même monde que Pokémon Soleil et Pokémon Lune, ainsi que de nouveaux Pokémon qui ne figuraient pas dans Pokémon Soleil et Pokémon Lune. Il y aura également d'autres éléments additionnels qui vous permettront de profiter de l'aventure encore davantage.
